title: Figure, "Dancing Cossak Boy", 1930–40
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Young boy dressed in tunic, fur cap, blue trousers, black boots, in dancing position with right leg extended, left bent underneath him, right arm out.

tombstone.epitaph: Figure, "Dancing Cossak Boy", 1930–40. Porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-252.
